author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Tom Burns for "Defects in Presentation of Role Type" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4947
In Party Manager go to Profile > Roles(s)
Expected: Screen refresh and return to Roles(s) tab on ProfileTabBar
In Party Manager go to Profile > Roles(s)
Expected: Roles listed in screenlet Add To Main Role > Role Type Id drop-down list
Actual: Screenlet Add To Main Role > Role Type Id drop-down list is empty.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the tree conflict data read functions from the svn_wc__db_ api.
(svn_wc__add_tree_conflict): Check existence of tree conflict instead
(already_in_a_tree_conflict): Check tree conflict boolean instead of data.
(test_read_write_tree_conflicts): Read via common api. Load list of conflict
victims instead of tree conflict victims.

author: rhuijben
msg: Avoid tree conflict data specific functions in the libsvn_wc info walker, when
we can just use the more generic conflict victim functions.
(info_found_node_callback): Read conflict victims instead of tree conflict
(svn_wc__get_info): Avoid one query per tree conflict to fetch the repository
and add another one to read the conflicts.
